Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ControlFunction = Tool:WaitForChild("ControlFunction")
Animations = { {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing1"), Duration = 0.5, Speed = 2, Damage = 12}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing2"), Duration = 0.6, Speed = 2.5, Damage = 20}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing3"), Duration = 0.5, Speed = 5, Damage = 8}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing4"), Duration = 0.5, Speed = 3, Damage = 15} }
Special = Tool:WaitForChild("Special")
Sounds = { Equip = Handle:WaitForChild("Equip"), InUse = Handle:WaitForChild("InUse") }
LastAnimUsed = nil AnimReused = 0
function ChooseAnimation() local AnimChosen = Animations[math.random(1, #Animations)] AnimReused = ((AnimChosen == LastAnimUsed and (AnimReused + 1)) or 0) if AnimChosen ~= LastAnimUsed or AnimReused <= 1 then LastAnimUsed = AnimChosen return AnimChosen else return ChooseAnimation() end end
function Activated() if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 or SpecialActive or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end local AnimChosen = ChooseAnimation() SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(AnimChosen.Animation) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Play(nil, nil, AnimChosen.Speed) AnimPlaying = AnimChosen end pcall(function() ControlFunction:InvokeServer("AnimationPlaying", {Name = AnimChosen.Animation.Name, Duration = AnimChosen.Duration, Damage = AnimChosen.Damage}) end) wait(AnimChosen.Duration) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end AnimPlaying = nil wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Sounds.Equip:Play() local CanPlaySound = true local UnequipConnection UnequipConnection = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CanPlaySound = false UnequipConnection:disconnect() end) Delay(8, function() if UnequipConnection then UnequipConnection:disconnect() end if CanPlaySound then Sounds.Equip:Stop() Sounds.InUse:Play() end end) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" then local SpecialSuccessful = false pcall(function() SpecialSuccessful = ControlFunction:InvokeServer("KeyDown", Key) end) if SpecialSuccessful then SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Special) if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Play(nil, nil, 0.5) end end end end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do v:Stop() end if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end AnimPlaying = nil end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
SpecialReady = true SpecialActive = false
Damage = 10 ReloadTime = 0 SpecialReloadTime = 60
IgnoreParts = {"Head", "Torso", "HumanoidRootPart", "Right Arm"}
AnimPlaying = nil
ControlFunction = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ControlFunction") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ControlFunction.Name = "ControlFunction" ControlFunction.Parent = Tool
ControlFunction.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "AnimationPlaying" and not AnimPlaying then AnimPlaying = Value wait(Value.Duration) AnimPlaying = nil elseif Mode == "KeyDown" and Value == "q" and SpecialReady then Spawn(function() ActivateSpecial() end) return true end return false end)
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CheckTableForString(Table, String) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if string.lower(v) == string.lower(String) then return true end end return false end
function CheckTableForInstance(Table, String) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == String then return true end end return false end
Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local HitParent = Hit.Parent if HitParent:IsA("Hat") or HitParent:IsA("Tool") then HitParent = HitParent.Parent end if Hit.Parent == Character then return end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip or (RightGrip.Part0 ~= Handle and RightGrip.Part1 ~= Handle) then return end if AnimPlaying and AnimPlaying.Name == "Swing4" and not CheckTableForString(IgnoreParts, Hit.Name) then local Sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") Sparkles.Color = Color3.new(255, 255, (127 / 255)) Debris:AddItem(Sparkles, 2) Sparkles.Parent = Handle Hit:BreakJoints() end local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage((AnimPlaying and AnimPlaying.Damage) or Damage) end end)
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function ActivateSpecial() SpecialActive = true SpecialReady = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 wait(0.5) Spawn(function() local IgnoreObjects = {Character} local Radius = 30 local CharacterSize = Character:GetModelSize() local CharacterCFrame = Character:GetModelCFrame() local NegativePartRadius = Vector3.new(((CharacterSize.X / 2) + (Radius / 1)), ((CharacterSize.Y / 2) + (Radius / 1)), ((CharacterSize.Z / 2) + (Radius / 1))) local PositivePartRadius = Vector3.new(((CharacterSize.X / 2) + (Radius / 1)), ((CharacterSize.Y / 2) + (Radius / 1)), ((CharacterSize.Z / 2) + (Radius / 1))) local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(CharacterCFrame.p - NegativePartRadius, CharacterCFrame.p + PositivePartRadius), IgnoreObjects, 100) local Humanoids = {} local Characters = {} local Orbs = {} for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then local character = v.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and not CheckTableForInstance(Humanoids, humanoid) then humanoid.PlatformStand = true table.insert(Humanoids, humanoid) table.insert(Characters, character) end end end for i, v in pairs(Characters) do if v and v.Parent then local torso = v:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then local Orb = Instance.new("Part") Orb.Name = "Orb" Orb.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright violet") Orb.Transparency = 0.5 Orb.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Orb.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Orb.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Orb.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Orb.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom local ModelSize = v:GetModelSize() local SizeY = (ModelSize.Y * 1.5) Orb.Size = Vector3.new(SizeY, SizeY, SizeY) Orb.Locked = true Orb.CanCollide = false Orb.Anchored = false local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = Orb local TotalMass = (GetTotalMass(v) + Orb:GetMass()) local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, (TotalMass * 196.20 ^ 2), 0) BodyForce.Parent = Orb BodyForce.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 1.5, 0) Orb.CFrame = torso.CFrame local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = Orb Weld.Part1 = torso Weld.Parent = Orb table.insert(Orbs, Orb) Debris:AddItem(Orb, 20) Orb.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end end end Delay(10, function() for i = 1, 100 do for ii, v in pairs(Orbs) do if v and v.Parent then local Mesh = v:FindFirstChild("Mesh") if Mesh then Mesh.Scale = Mesh.Scale - Vector3.new(0.01, 0.01, 0.01) wait(0.001) end end end end for i, v in pairs(Orbs) do if v and v.Parent then local Explosion = Instance.new("Explosion") Explosion.BlastRadius = 25 Explosion.BlastPressure = 0 Explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters Explosion.Position = v.Position Explosion.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") v:Destroy() end end for i, v in pairs(Characters) do if v and v.Parent then local humanoid = v:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid.PlatformStand = false UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(humanoid.MaxHealth) end end end end) end) wait(4.5) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 SpecialActive = false wait(SpecialReloadTime) SpecialReady = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
